Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.wire

package com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.wire
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.kneelawk.graphlib.api
     
    com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.graph
     
    com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.util
     
    com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.world
     
  • Class
    Description
    CenterWireBlockNode
    A block node that sits, hovering in the center of the block but without taking up the entire block space.
    CenterWireConnectionFilter
    Allows an external object to filter the connections connecting to a center wire block node.
    FullWireBlockNode
    A block node wire that occupies a full block instead of sitting on the side of a block.
    FullWireConnectionFilter
    Allows an external object to filter the connections connecting to a full block wire block node.
    LinkKeyFactory
    Creates link keys from context.
    SidedFaceBlockNode
    A block node that occupies a side of a block and can connect to center-wire block nodes, like a SidedWireBlockNode, but that cannot connect to other sided block nodes.
    SidedFaceConnectionFilter
    Allows an external object to filter the connections connecting to a sided face block node.
    SidedWireBlockNode
    A block node wire that occupies the side of a block.
    SidedWireConnectionFilter
    Allows an external object to filter the connections connecting to a sided wire block node.
    WireConnectionDiscoverers
    Contains wire connection finder and checker implementations for use in BlockNode implementations.
    WireConnectionFilter
    More general wire connection filter, designed only to determine if two types of block nodes should be allowed to connect.
    WireConnectionType
    The type of connection a sided wire block node could be forming.
